6.name: Payment Module x1
6.request:
SELECT COUNT(distinct m.id_module) FROM PREFIX_hook h LEFT JOIN PREFIX_hook_module hm ON h.id_hook = hm.id_hook LEFT JOIN PREFIX_module m ON hm.id_module = m.id_module
WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

7.name: Payment Modules x2
7.request:
SELECT COUNT(distinct m.id_module) FROM PREFIX_hook h LEFT JOIN PREFIX_hook_module hm ON h.id_hook = hm.id_hook LEFT JOIN PREFIX_module m ON hm.id_module = m.id_module
WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

8.name: Carrier x1
8.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_carrier WHERE name NOT IN ("0", "My carrier")

9.name: Carriers x2
9.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_carrier WHERE name NOT IN ("0", "My carrier")

10.name: Product x1
10.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_product WHERE reference NOT LIKE "demo_%"

15.name: Products x100000
15.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_product WHERE reference NOT LIKE "demo_%"

22.name: Template
22.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_theme WHERE directory != "default" AND directory != "prestashop"

30.name: Carriers x3
30.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_carrier WHERE name NOT IN ("0", "My carrier")

29.name: Payment Modules x3
29.request:
SELECT COUNT(distinct m.id_module) FROM PREFIX_hook h LEFT JOIN PREFIX_hook_module hm ON h.id_hook = hm.id_hook LEFT JOIN PREFIX_module m ON hm.id_module = m.id_module
WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

31.name: Revenue > 100 (Base EUR)
31.request:
SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate)
FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1 AND reference != "XKBKNABJK"

32.name: Revenue > 1000 (Base EUR)
32.request: SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate) FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1 AND reference != "XKBKNABJK"

33.name: Revenue > 10 000 (Base EUR)
33.request: SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate) FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1 AND reference != "XKBKNABJK"

34.name: Revenue > 100 000 (Base EUR)
34.request: SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate) FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1

35.name: Revenue > 1 million (Base EUR)
35.request: SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate) FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1

36.name: Revenue > 10 millions (Base EUR)
36.request: SELECT SUM(total_paid_tax_excl / c.conversion_rate) FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1

76.name: North America
76.request:
SELECT IFNULL(id_order, 0) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_address a ON o.id_address_delivery = a.id_address LEFT JOIN PREFIX_country c ON c.id_country = a.id_country WHERE o.valid = 1 AND a.id_country != "{config}PS_COUNTRY_DEFAULT{/config}" AND c.iso_code IN (
"CA",
"GL",
"PM",
"US"
)
